FileFormat.FormatDescription: WordPerfect is a word processor application currently owned by Corel. Applications implementing the libwpd library should be able to render older WordPerfect documents. WordPerfect documents created within a Macintosh environment are likely to lack a format extension.

InternalSignature.SignatureNote: Word Perfect magic: 0xFF'WPC', {4} Product code 0x01=Word Perfect, File Type 0x2C=MAC WP, File Format Major Version 0x04=4 - http://www.columbia.edu/~em36/wpdos/WPMac4FileFormat.pdf
